Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward  5
Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward  9
Town of Killian -- 1% S&U Tax - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Killian Proposition 
(Sales Tax)

Summary:  A ten (10) year one percent (1%) sales tax for operating the Town of Killian.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Killian be authorized to levy a ten (10) year one percent (1%) sales tax for operating the Town of Killian.  The estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $3000.00; and the Town to be authorized to fund the proceeds of the tax to pay the costs as follows:  said tax of one third percent (1/3%) to be used for Killian Water Works, said tax of one third percent (1/3%) for Administrative, said tax of one third percent (1/3%) for Public Safety and exempts from said tax the Private Sales of all Registered Vehicles and Motor Craft?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #7 -- Service Charge Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Livingston Fire Protection District #7 Proposition

Summary:  Renewal of a 10-year service charge of up to $32.00 per structure for fire protection services.
Race.FullText: Shall the Livingston Fire Protection District #7, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to renew a service charge in an amount not to exceed $32.00 per annum for each residential or commercial structure for a term not to exceed ten years, commencing January 1, 2010, to be assessed on persons owning each such structure, whether occupied or unoccupied, located wholly or partly within the boundaries of the District (an estimated $24,000 is reasonably expected to be collected for this year)?
